_sText:
Well its 12:55 am, I'm red-eyed and extremely tired after working all day on this damned map, and I've got school at 6:00 am tomorrow, but I can proudly say, it's ready for beta-release.

It's been 2 days of work, which wouldn't seem like a lot but I literally sat on the computer all weekend (had the flu) and clicked, clicked, typed and clicked. But you don't care do you, you want to hear about the map:

It's 12:55 A.M. and you get the call from the SWAT chief, there's a hostage situation at the city bank. Right before closing, 10 heavily armed men came in, barricaded the doors, and took 2 of the employees that knew the vault security number. You hop in your car and head down to meet with your 9 well-armed companions in the back, where the robbers have attempted to tunnel out of the basement. Your objective: Kill the robbers and rescue the hostages. You've got 3 options for entry:

Hop into the tunnel with no return and hope to god you can take them;

Enter through the back entrance into the vault;

or bust through the skylight light an action star and take siege of the place.

Now that you've heard the fancy description here's some general information:

It was made by me, obviously, entirely, so please check out my profile:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/members/608513

My reason for creating it was a desire to add another submission to my studio:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/studios/21716

and the map WOULD NOT be possible without the perfect skybox from Karatekaefer:

//His profile: http://www.fpsbanana.com/members/138831

//The texture itself, Mpa100: http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/1034

So please enjoy the map, and yea, it may seem a bit drab, but it's been tested on a 20 slot server and it was a lot of fun with max players!

<DISS4LIFE>
